title: COMP/STAT112 Notebook
text:
Introduction
This is my online notebook for COMP/STAT112 course taken at Macalester College. Please, use the side bar on the left for navigation.

title: 2  Activity 03
text:
hikes <- read.csv(“https://mac-stat.github.io/data/high_peaks.csv”) head(hikes)
library(tidyverse) ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating))

3 COMMENT on the change in the code and the corresponding change in the plot
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar()


4 COMMENT on the change in the code and the corresponding change in the plot
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar() + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)


5 COMMENT on the change in the code and the corresponding change in the plot
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)


6 COMMENT on the change in the code and the corresponding change in the plot
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(color = “orange”, fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”)


7 COMMENT on the change in the code and the corresponding change in the plot
ggplot(hikes, aes(x = rating)) + geom_bar(color = “orange”, fill = “blue”) + labs(x = “Rating”, y = “Number of hikes”) + theme_minimal()
